Set #71012 Stitch: LEGO first teamed up with Disney a long time ago, but not in a galaxy far, far away. The first Disney inspired sets included Mickey, Minnie and Winnie the Pooh. Then they strengthened their bonds to the point that we finally got some impressive sets, and now a great looking Collectible Minifigures Series.
Stitch as a Minifigure is pretty impressive, he'
column2: s got a fully sculpted and molded head piece that captures the look of this character perfectly, with large expressive eyes and huge ears for detecting sounds everywhere. His torso is printed on both sides, the belly on the front and the markings on the back, and his legs included limited printing for his toes. He includes no accessories.

column1: Stitch is a strong contender, however he'
column2: s a bit lacking without Lilo to pair him up with. Hopefully a future series will include her as a companion for her best friend. I&#39
column3: d also like to see a costumed Stitch in the future as a variant with his space suit on and futuristic energy blasters. Like with most of this series I strongly recommend him, I&#39
column4: m just a huge Disney fan and this series of CMFs is superb.
